definitions.definition: A closed container for liquids or gases.
examples: The propane is stored in these tanks .
The tank contains unfiltered water. You really shouldn't drink from that.

definitions.definition: An open container or pool for storing water or other liquids.
examples: The contractors installed a new tank with gorgeous fish and corals.
The ore slurries are directed into an open tank outside the excavation site.

definitions.definition: A pond, pool, or small lake (either natural or artificial).
The fuel reservoir of a vehicle.
examples: We have brought the van to a garage after we found a leak in the tank .

definitions.definition: The amount held by a container; a tankful .
examples: I burned three tanks of gas on the drive to New York.

definitions.definition: An armoured fighting vehicle , armed with a gun designed for direct fire , and moving on caterpillar tracks .
examples: The journalist mistook the self-propelled artillery vehicle for a tank .
Few remember the female tanks that were produced between the World Wars.

definitions.definition: ( Australia , India ) A reservoir or dam.
( botany ) A structure of tightly overlapping leaves used by some bromeliads to retain water .
( colloquial ) A very muscular and physically imposing person; somebody who is built like a tank .
( UK , slang , dated , by extension ) A bouncer or doorman .

( roleplaying games , board games , video games ) A unit or character designed primarily around damage absorption and holding the attention of the enemy (as opposed to dealing damage, healing, or other tasks).
examples: The paladin can make for a decent tank , but I recommend that you get a class with better taunting skills.

definitions.definition: ( US , slang ) A prison cell , or prison generally.
examples: The sheriff threw us in the tank without charges!

definitions.definition: ( poker , slang ) A metaphorical place where a player goes to contemplate a decision; see in the tank .
( rail transport ) Ellipsis of tank engine or tank locomotive .

main_definition: A closed container for liquids or gases.
secondary_definitions: An open container or pool for storing water or other liquids.

definitions.definition: A small Indian dry measure , averaging 240 grains in weight.
A Bombay weight of 72 grains , for pearls .

main_definition: A small Indian dry measure , averaging 240 grains in weight.
